changeAdmin(address).notice: Changes the address of the admin

getSandAmountWithDai(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of SAND that can be bought using a specific amount of DAI

getSandAmountWithEther(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of SAND that can be bought using a specific amount of ETH

withdrawSand(address,uint256).notice: Transfers the SAND balance from this contract to another address

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to sell SAND tokens (accepts ETH and DAI) at a fixed USD price
